channel.title: THE PRUNING (this is not a complaint , an idea)
channel.description:
I thought of a good idea last night , there should be a new section called "server updates" and the description should be: "post your updates/train areas etc here!" This will stop people complaining and will give them an area where they can post their "updates" other than the tutorials section. Reply with a "i agree" to get added to the list!: -tobias222 -zezi111 (FIRST SUPPORTER! THANKS! :)
-Oh and i thought of the rules for this section aswelll and some nessecary stickies: STICKIES: -Update list (possibly in colour green and blue? ;p) -Update section rules -Layout rules -Requests -Report leechers here (with quote, link + URL proof!) RULES: -No spamming. Not even in the requests -Post with punctuation and grammer -We want your opinions of updates. not "leeched" (without proof) -If something is leeched , report with evidence and the URL of post to the reported leechers thread

item.title: THE PRUNING (this is not a complaint , an idea)
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

It would seem that Moparisthebest has already done this (Click here). That section has already been made, don’t tell me otherwise. You can’t go crazy in that section though if you know what I mean. Creating a thread to show every little thing you’ve done. 1 is enough.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

I thought of a good idea last night , there should be a new section called “server updates” and the description should be: “post your updates/train areas etc here!”
This will stop people complaining and will give them an area where they can post their “updates” other than the tutorials section. Reply with a “i agree” to get added to the list!:
-tobias222
-zezi111 (FIRST SUPPORTER! THANKS!

-Oh and i thought of the rules for this section aswelll and some nessecary stickies:
STICKIES:
-Update list (possibly in colour green and blue? ;p)
-Update section rules
-Layout rules
-Requests
-Report leechers here (with quote, link + URL proof!)
RULES:
-No spamming. Not even in the requests
-Post with punctuation and grammer
-We want your opinions of updates. not “leeched” (without proof)
-If something is leeched , report with evidence and the URL of post to the reported leechers thread
